{{Disambig}}

'''Sky''' may refer to:

* [[Sky]] – the visual sky in ''Minecraft''
* [[End sky]] – the static distant visuals specifically present in [[the End]]
* {{BlockLink|Air}} – the unoccupied space in ''Minecraft''
* The [[End]] – a dark, empty dimension populated with [[endermen]] and the [[ender dragon]]
* The [[Sky Dimension]] – a planned dimension that was intended to be the opposite of the [[Nether]]
* [[Altitude]]
* {{BlockLink|id=sky|Sky (block)}} – a joke block added in [[25w14craftmine]].
* {{ItemLink|Sky Box}} – a joke item added in [[25w14craftmine]].
* [[Chase the Skies]] – a [[game drop]] that got released in June 2025.

=== Features in the [[Overworld]] sky include: ===

* The [[sun]], [[moon]], stars, and the [[daylight cycle]]
* [[Cloud]]s
* [[Weather]]
* [[Biome]]-specific sky coloring
